definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society

sentences.english: Ageing will put pressure on societies at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 老龄问题将对社会各阶层带来压力。

sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义信仰是中国社会的主导信仰。

sentences.english: They found that the higher their level of social interaction, the better their cognitive functioning.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现，社会交往越多的人认知表现越好。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: They are adhering to what society expects and internalising behaviours。
sentences.chinese: 他们遵从社会期望，并在行为上把这些期望内在化。

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 该报告引用了一些社会和经济原因解释这一跨越。

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遗传的宗法制度毋宁是儒家文化的深厚社会基础。

sentences.english: I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，觉得社会场合有压力。

sentences.english: At that time, the public order in Dingxiang was very chaotic.
sentences.chinese: 当时定襄的社会治安十分混乱。

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: Dr Mae-wan Ho, Institute of Science in Society, London, UK.
sentences.chinese: 何美芸博士，社会科学研究院，伦敦，英国。

sentences.english: Members of primitive society do not distinguish between medicine, magic and religion.
sentences.chinese: 原始社会的成员并没有区别医学，魔术与宗教。

sentences.english: Mr Zorin says this kind of social engineering is the key to understanding today's problem.
sentences.chinese: 佐林指出这种社会工程是理解俄罗斯现有问题的关键。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身体语言，已被广泛地研究社会心理学。

sentences.english: This pattern is also widespread among Near Eastern societies.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式近东社会中也很普遍。

sentences.english: There is stronger sense of responsibility, with society honor versus dishonor view.
sentences.chinese: 有较强的责任感，和社会荣辱观。

definition: to put money above everything else
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
every trade/all professions/all walks of life
human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
